name: places/ChIJZSm2NfxZwokRIuBueRLrwYw
formattedAddress: 120 Central Park S # 1F, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 120 Central Park S # 1F, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
I had my second session last Saturday (October 2023). The whole laser experience is very new to me so still a little nervous. My first appointment was great. I forget her name but the technician was so professional and took her time to explain the process. She was patient and pleasant. On 28 October I had my second ever session and it wasn't as pleasant. The technician  was on her phone scrolling on social media when I walked both in and out. She rushed through the appointment. She was scrolling on her phone as she went over the aftercare instructions. I could barely hear her as she was seated in a corner at the desk scrolling. I was highly disappointed because my fist session was so amazing that I signed up for more services and intended to buy more packages for other areas but rethinking to try another place for my other body parts. Great location though, easy to get to. Also, front receptionists are nice and professional. Just a terrible technician I experienced unfortunately.

EDIT: I received a call from Kaila who was very helpful in reassuring me that my experience is not the norm at SEV. Thank you Kaila for the effort. My last two sessions have been smooth and the technicians amazing. I purchased more packages too.

originalText.text: Lobby was clean. Atmosphere was really nice. Receptionist kind. Jennifer - I believe that‚Äôs her name (lady who did my laser) was very informative & always did a test patch before she continued. The cool air helped so much with the pain.

originalText.text:
Love it here. Have been a client for over 5 years and they never disappoint. Professionalism and customer service are top-tier. Huge shout out to the office manager Kaila for being so kind and understanding.
You are awesome!

text.text:
Love it here. Have been a client for over 5 years and they never disappoint. Professionalism and customer service are top-tier. Huge shout out to the office manager Kaila for being so kind and understanding.
You are awesome!

originalText.text: I had high hopes when I decided to try laser hair removal with Sev Laser, but unfortunately, the results have been disappointing. After spending a significant amount of money, I have seen little to no reduction in hair growth. I wish I had seen better results considering the money spent and time. I had over 17 sessions when they said that the average person takes 10-12 to see results, the staff seemed to not know if my follicles were closing or not. Considering that you have a different staff member for every visit. They should have known the progress and give recommendations but they seems to not care or mind. It wasn't until my last few appointments that they put me with the same member but I was already tired of seeing the same results and spending money.  This place its a NO for me. As of now, my underarms and bikini hair growth is back to normal so basically I wasted my money.  Don't waste your money too!!!

originalText.text: My first time at Sev Laser, I was referred by my best friend. 1st location.. easy to get too! And the area I loved it! My first impressions was wow... Now this is where I want to continue coming. The receptionist are friendly, kind, funny, and make you feel welcomed! The smell of the office was Amazing... But baby.... The music was amazing üòç. Now to Jen my technician.... She was so informative, attentive and knowledgeable. In all my years of getting laser, this is the first time I felt at ease & relaxed. I would recommend Sev Laser 1 trillion times over. I can't wait till my next appointment.
